articles.author: Jeff Kassouf and Jeff Carlisle
articles.title: USA, Mexico withdraw 2027 Women's World Cup bid, look to 2031 - ESPN
articles.description: U.S. Soccer and the Mexican Football Federation have withdrawn their bid to jointly host the 2027 Women's World Cup and will instead focus on securing the 2031 Women's World Cup, the federations announced on Monday.
articles.content:
